work_tasks.description:
type:work
phase:P6

skill:execution-infra
agent:infra-implementer
files:.claude/CLAUDE.md
priority:high
---
Add two new rules to CLAUDE.md §1.1 (Lead section):

1. AskUserQuestion mandate: Lead MUST use AskUserQuestion tool for ALL user-facing questions. Inline text-only questions are prohibited.

2. DLAT spawn rule: When invoking doing-like-agent-teams skill, ALL subsequent agent spawns MUST set:
   - run_in_background: true
   - context: fork
   - NO team_name field (single-session mode, not multi-session teams)

Impact: Ensures consistent user question tracking + clarifies single-session vs. multi-session spawning patterns

work_tasks.subject: Update doing-like-agent-teams SKILL.md — clarify team_name not needed in single-session
work_tasks.description:
type:work
phase:P6
domain:execution
skill:execution-infra
agent:infra-implementer
files:.claude/skills/doing-like-agent-teams/SKILL.md
priority:medium
---
Add explicit clarification section in SKILL.md L2 body:

1. team_name field clarification:
   - team_name is NOT required in single-session (DLAT) mode
   - team_name is ONLY for multi-session tmux Agent Teams mode

2. Single-session subagent pattern:
   - Fire-and-forget workers (no inbox, no P2P messaging)
   - Spawned with run_in_background:true + context:fork
   - No team_name field

3. Update SKILL.md examples to show both patterns:
   - Example 1: Single-session DLAT (no team_name)
   - Example 2: Multi-session teams (with team_name, TeamCreate)

Impact: Prevents confusion about when to use team_name, clarifies single-session vs. multi-session execution models
